Package com.example.pizzeria.models

Class Order

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.example.pizzeria.models.Order
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Customizable
    public class Order
extends java.lang.Object
implements Customizable
    The Order class represents an order of one or more pizzas and uniquely identified by an integer id.
    Author:
    Serena Zeng, Jackson Lee

      Constructors

      Order()
      Create new Order object that defaults to valid with an empty list of pizzas, and a new order id.
